document_data.name: Boar's Rest
document_data.mainbody: '''Boar's Rest''' was a stone mansion located in the town of [[Triboar]]. It was built by, and served as the residence for, the pompous retired adventurer [[Hyuth Kolstaag]].
document_data.Location: It was built on a small hill, on the northwest side of the [[Long Road]], that offered a great view overlooking the town.
document_data.Atmosphere: The interior of Boar's Rest was decorated with a number of souvenirs and relics from Kolstaag's adventuring years.
document_data.History: The Boar's Rest was constructed about five years before Triboar was assaulted by a pair of [[fire giant]]s and their minions.
